name: Dragon Inn
description:
更新人物小传，具体可看评论

I hope the model will inspire artists and enthusiasts to create unique and beautiful artwork in the New Dragon Inn style. If you are satisfied with this model, please consider supporting my work by leaving a positive review or buying me a cup of coffee.

I am excited to share my latest AI drawing model, inspired by the iconic film New Dragon Inn. This model is designed to enable artists and enthusiasts to create artwork in the distinctive style of the film.

The New Dragon Inn model is based on SD1.5. The model can be used to generate high-quality images that capture the mood and atmosphere of the film, with its bold use of colors, dramatic lighting, and intricate details.

The image size for this model is 540x300, but it can also be used to generate images in other standard sizes.

Moreover, the model includes several control parameters that allow users to adjust the generated image's atmosphere. By adjusting parameters such as coat, sand, fire, and others, users can create images that convey a variety of moods, from peaceful and serene to intense and dramatic. These control parameters provide even greater flexibility for artists and enthusiasts to experiment and create unique artworks in the New Dragon Inn style.
